document_data.name: House of Cogs and Hammers
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Cogs and Hammers''' was temple devoted to [[Gond]] located in [[Tulmon]] along the [[Lake of Steam]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The main gate of the temple was crowned with a large clock where all of the gears and inner working were visible. Many of Tulmon's children gathered around the gate to gaze in wonder at the small moving parts.
document_data.Activities: As one of Tulmon's newest temples during that time, the House of Cogs and Hammers created quite a buzz among Tulmonites. Many eagerly supported the temple's services of constructing and selling various tools and gadgets.
document_data.Inhabitants: The House of Cogs and Hammers was run by Master [[Kalavdan Talast]].
